page.title: 20Fritchley Poems
page.content:
I like Fritchley because it has lots of fields and I like picking flowers and I like feeding the horse and stroking it and I like walking to school and doing my maths.I like picking damsons out of the back field. I dont like the noisy traffic and the muddy footpath, and I dont like crossing the road at the top of the hill. I dont like Fritchley because there is no Sports Centre and nowhere to play football or cricket.There are no swings and slides.I wish there were things like fairs,discos and circuses. That would be more fun.Fritchley is untidy and I dont like the streets _it's too far to the shop if you want a can of pop!
{Emily,Glen,Andrew,David,Gareth,Wayne.
